participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, with a strong passion for fitness and a love for vibrant colors.
participant_1.background: i live in a house. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and intellectual, with a deep appreciation for nature and a commitment to personal growth.
participant_2.background: i am an avid kayaker. i am also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.

my favorite color is yellow.
i love italian food and garlic bread.
i am a gold medalist olympian.
gymnastics is my favorite sport.
i workout four hours a day.
